io.github.dddplus.annotation

注释类型 Extension


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Inherited
 @Component
public @interface Extension
    扩展点，注解在IDomainExtension之上.

    • 必需元素概要

      所需元素 
      限定符和类型 必需的元素和说明
      String code
      扩展点编号，bind to Pattern.code() or Partner.code() or IPolicy.extensionCode(IIdentity).

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      String name
      扩展点名称.
      String value
      The value may indicate a suggestion for a logical component name, to be turned into a Spring bean in case of an autodetected component.

    • 元素详细资料

      • code

        public abstract String code
        扩展点编号，bind to Pattern.code() or Partner.code() or IPolicy.extensionCode(IIdentity).

      • value

        @AliasFor(annotation=org.springframework.stereotype.Component.class,
          attribute="value")
public abstract String value
        The value may indicate a suggestion for a logical component name, to be turned into a Spring bean in case of an autodetected component.
        返回:
        the suggested component name, if any
        默认值:
        ""

      • name

        public abstract String name
        扩展点名称.
        默认值:
        ""
